name: Prospecting Strategies Using LinkedIn Sales Navigator
content: Prospecting and business development are a must for any business. LinkedIn Sales Navigator makes prospecting and growth efficient through a simplified and automated process. Learn how to use the tools available in this premium version of LinkedIn to find your ideal client, connect with your leads and drive engagement efficiently. Why Should You Attend Attendees should either be those in a sales/business development role or business owner looking to grow and utilize technology to become more efficient in their prospecting activities. Objectives of the Presentation » Find your ideal client on LinkedIn Sales Navigator » How to use saved searches and lead lists to increase efficiency » How to use search functions to build targeted prospecting lists » Engage with your leads skillfully on LinkedIn Areas Covered in the Session » Navigation of LinkedIn Sales Navigator » How to search for Ideal Client » Types of lists to build for prospecting purposes » Strategy for using LinkedIn to grow » How to effectively engage with your leads and build trust Who Will Benefit » Leaders » Managers » Salespeople » Business Development » Sales Managers » Business Owners To Register (or) for more details please click on this below link: https://bit.ly/3d5Ozny Email: support@abideedict.com Toll Free No:1-844-511-8858 Tel: +1-913-871-1466
